title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Airbus A320 - Amsterdam to Zurich hyperlapse
description:
In this video I will fly from Amsterdam to Zurich. Landing could have been better but for some reason the autopilot was not capturing the glideslope correctly which resulted in a manual intervention which I started a little bit to late. 
This video is a hyperlapse which means the video which normally was approximately 1 hour has been shorted to approximately 3 minutes. The audio of the game is removed completely and as a replacement music has been added.

The software I used to create the hyperlapse is Microsoft Hyperlapse Pro. More information about the tool can be found on the site below:

https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/research/product/computational-photography-applications/microsoft-hyperlapse-pro/
